content.name:
What is a private
social club?
text: Originating in London, and growing in popularity in major cities around the world, modern takes on private social clubs have captured the social Zeitgeist.

content.name:
What do social
clubs offer?
text: Modern social clubs exude luxury consciousness and are hubs that create social connectivity across lines of generation, class and gender.

content.name:
A New kind of
Wellness Social Club
text: Cunard merges the codes of modern social clubs and the destination spa experience. The result is a nexus for wellness that feels exciting and essential for voyagers wanting to maximize the social impact of a cruise. The spa celebrates a new kind of meaningful and mindful luxury grounded in health and wellness, revitalising the classic archetypes of adventures by sea, and eclectic doyenne beauty.
No. 12 merges the codes of modern social clubs and the destination spa experience.

content.name: No.12
text:
The spa, re-imagined.
The first maritime wellness social club grounded in global healing practices. This is the beating heart of our ship, a place for the body to rest, the mind to reboot, the spirit to engage.

content.name: No.12
text: Numbers convey a sense of mystery; those who know, know. In London, 'No. 10' is shorthand for the seat of power.

12 represents the completed cycle of experience.
There are 12 major bodies of water, as well as 12 chakras and 12 units of time and space (minutes, hours, months, inches). The magic of 12 is it's universal application across geography and culture.

No. 12 offers programming synchronised to the natural rhythms of the sea and the sky. Each day, we reveal our 12 most important insightsfortheday. Focused mornings, energetic days and long evenings to unwind. Tune in to your fellow seamates with our daily services (morning meditation and classes, afternoon tea, evening elemental ceremonies around water, fire, earth & air) or tune out for some personal time.

content.name: British
text: To be British today is to be respectful and clever, dapper yet fresh, formal in design yet passionate about the details. To be British today is to live amidst centuries of leaders and legends, the imaginative the fearless. We carry their souls yet push forward with our hearts.

content.name: Joy
text: Equal parts detox & retox. Rooted in a belief that living well should be joyful, not a sacrifice.

content.name: Allure
text: To be coveted for embodying the essence of hospitality- graciousness & respect delivered exquisitely and quietly, not because of high design or stylish tricks.

content.name: Philosophy
text: Underpinning our entire design philosophy is well-being. We have partnered with Delos to create healthy environments to support our innovative wellness programs. Along with Delos, we place health and wellness at the center of design, construction and facilities.

Exploring the intersection between people and the built environment, we create spaces that actively contribute to human health, performance and well-being by marrying the best innovations in technology, health, science, design and enterprise. We see the built environment as an asset to maximize human potential, and we envision environments that enhance us – that are both proactive and reactive – to live better by cultivating healthy lifestyle choices and helping prevent health problems before they begin.

content.name: Modern
text: Modern need not be cold and sleek. Heritage rendered new.

content.name: Layered
text: Refined luxury with a just- under-the-surface creative heartbeat.

content.name: Personal
text: Graciousness and warmth, with a thoughtful touch.
